Class DragController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.anjuke.devlib.component.tools.FloatViewManager
      • com.anjuke.devlib.component.tools.DragController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.view.GestureDetector.OnGestureListener, android.view.View.OnTouchListener, IFloatViewManager

    public class DragController
extends FloatViewManager
implements android.view.View.OnTouchListener, android.view.GestureDetector.OnGestureListener
